column1: # Archimedes Model Dataset: US vs China Ratios
# - child_mortality_volatility_ratio: Ratio of US to China child mortality volatility
#   Higher values = US has higher child mortality volatility relative to China
# - food_volatility_ratio: Ratio of US to China food price volatility
#   Higher values = US has higher food price volatility relative to China
# - gdp_volatility_ratio: Ratio of US to China GDP volatility
#   Higher values = US has higher GDP volatility relative to China
# - exchange_rate_volatility: Exchange rate volatility between USD and CNY
# Missing values indicate data not available for that year
